channel.title: Can somone please help me, i cant create a shop
channel.description: i have tried at least 5 tutorials, and i still cant get this to work. my teamviewer is 521 482 133 and pass is 7g32gv

item.title: Can somone please help me, i cant create a shop
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

You have to add an extra case to the method secondClick( in ActionHandler.java which consists of these:

case ID:
c.getShops().openShop(#);
break;

ID = the npc id of the npc which you want to open the shop for you.

= the shop id that was assigned in shops.cfg: shops =

Read full topic

item.title: Can somone please help me, i cant create a shop
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

i created a shop in shop.cfg (there were no other shops in there before) then i added the shop to zeke’s menu.
then i spawned zeke and when i right click and hit trade on him… nothing happens.

item.title: Can somone please help me, i cant create a shop
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

You should not post your teamviewer information. Random people can see it, and MAY join just to infect your computer with an harmful program anyway they can. I’ve seen it happen. We, the members viewing this topic, will help you create a shop. Just explain to us what you are trying to do.

Read full topic
